title: Story Puzzle
description: Arrange the fragments to form a coherent story

questions.correctAnswer: Die hond hardloop in die park. Hy jaag 'n bal en blaf van opgewondenheid.
questions.englishTranslation: The dog runs in the park. He chases a ball and barks with excitement.

questions.correctAnswer: Die voël vlieg oor die bome. Dit sing 'n lied en geniet die wind.
questions.englishTranslation: The bird flies over the trees. It sings a song and enjoys the wind.

questions.correctAnswer: Die leeu stap deur die savanne. Dit brul hard en wys sy krag.
questions.englishTranslation: The lion walks through the savannah. It roars loudly and shows its strength.
